about_the_game:
Get ready for the next battle with this partial demo of the ultimate 3D fighting game, TEKKEN 8, the latest addition to the TEKKEN series.

Playable Modes:
- STORY "The Dark Awakens" (beginning)
- ARCADE QUEST (beginning)
- SUPER GHOST BATTLE (limited)
- GALLERY (limited)
- VERSUS (limited)

Playable Characters and Battle Stages:
- Characters: Jin, Kazuya, Paul, and Nina
- Stages: URBAN SQUARE (EVENING), YAKUSHIMA, and SANCTUM

*Online Mode will not be available.
*Some content may differ from the full game.
*Player data will not transfer to the full game.

name: TEKKEN 8 - DEMO

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Get ready for the next battle with this partial demo of the ultimate 3D fighting game, TEKKEN 8, the latest addition to the TEKKEN series.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Spanish - Latin America, Thai, Portuguese - Brazil, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Korean
*languages with full audio support
